quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Strings[/h1]

A [b]String [/b]is an object that represents a sequence of characters.
 For example, "Hello" is a string of 5 characters.

For example:[code format="java"][b]String [/b]s = "SoloLearn"; [/code]

answers.text: char is used to store numeric values

quizzes.question: Which statement in regard to the char data type is true?
